sentences: Parties agreed to the US proposal to request submissions for consideration by SBSTA-21 and SBSTA-22 on how to adequately address the main issues that arose from the SBSTA-20 event on research in response to the IPCC TAR.
Parties agreed on the draft conclusions with this, and other minor changes.
enb_long_title: Twentieth Session of the Subsidiary Bodies to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
